comments_since_last_sample.body: Daily Reminder Taiwan is an independent country
No matter how terrifying movies are at Halloween, reality will top it. Happy Halloween.

Taiwan and South Korea look like juicy targets to China. If South Korea thinks they're safe when China is already trying to expand into India and take Taiwan they're out of their minds. All the countries in Asia excluding China should form an alliance to fight together should any one of them be invaded by China. Otherwise none of them stand a chance at maintaining their sovereignty.
Why hadn't any country done anything in the last 20 yes to stop China WTH
